text: Tanda is a constituency of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly covering the city of Tanda in the Ambedkar Nagar district of Uttar Pradesh, India. Tanda is one of five assembly constituencies in the Ambedkar Nagar (Lok Sabha constituency) Since 2008, this assembly constituency is numbered 278 amongst 403 constituencies. Currently this seat belongs to Bharatiya Janta Party candidate Sanju Devi who won in last Assembly election of 2017 Uttar Pradesh Lagislative Elections defeating Samajwadi Party candidate Azeemul Haq Pahalwan by a margin of 1,723 votes. ==2017 Election results== {| class="wikitable" | colspan="4" |2017 Uttar Pradesh Assembly election: Tanda |- |Party |Candidate |Votes |% |- |BJP |Sanju Devi
